it.unibz.pomodroid.models
Class User

java.lang.Object
  it.unibz.pomodroid.models.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
User
public class User
extends Object

A class representing a tipical pomodroid user. Each user has its username (string), password (tring), trac url (absolute url), prom url (absolute url).

Author:
Daniel Graziotin 4801 , Thomas Schievenin 5701
